channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Hyper Protect Virtual Server for Classic (hpvs) is the new name of Hyper Protect Virtual Server
[removed] Compose for MySQL (compose-for-mysql)
item.description: This offering is deprecated and all instances will be removed after March 1st, 2023. Consider using our next generation service, Databases for MySQL.

item.title: [removed] Compose for RethinkDB (compose-for-rethinkdb)
item.description: This offering is deprecated and all instances will be removed after March 1st, 2023. Consider using our next generation service, Databases for MongoDB.

item.title: [removed] Compose for ScyllaDB (compose-for-scylladb)
item.description: This offering is deprecated and all instances will be removed after March 1st, 2023. Consider using our next generation service, Databases for DataStax.

item.title: [updated] VMware as a Service (vmware.directorsite) has a new plan named directorsite
[updated] Watson Query (data-virtualization) has changed the description of the plan named lite
item.description: *before*: One Watson Query instance with 1 head and 1 worker node. Head and worker nodes have 4 vCPU and 16 GB RAM per node. Lite instances automatically expire and are deleted after 30 days. Watson Query is available on IBM Cloud Pak for Data as a Service., *after*: One Watson Query instance with 1 head and 1 worker node. Head and worker nodes have 4 vCPU and 16 GB RAM per node. Lite instances automatically expire and are deleted after 30 days. If no data sources are created and no database objects are defined five days after a Lite plan is assigned to the Client, the Lite plan is deleted. Watson Query is available on IBM Cloud Pak for Data as a Service.
